revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CradlePoint |model=PHS300 |revision=v1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/18/2007 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model=MPB-211U |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=mobile hotspot |fcc_id=UXX-PHS300 |ic_id=6921A-PHS300 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ubicom |cpu1_model=IP3023 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV320B-70TCP |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L128168A-7T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI,USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=U-MEDIA WMD-201A |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2413A |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags=battery,3G capable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=PHS-XXX |default_ssid_regex=^PHS-[a-f0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:30:44 |oui_eth= }} [http://www.cradlepoint.com/products/mobile-broadband-routers/phs300-personal-wifi-hotspot Support page] :EoL. Last firmware (2.6.1) was released 05/12/2011 "MPB-211U" and "Rev:UD" is silkscreened on the main board.
"WMD-201A Rev.UA" is silkscreened on the wireless module. This device was sold by '''Sprint''' as the PHS300S. There are multiple revisions of this device. They may share the same FCC ID and basic hardware. The default SSID for these devices appears to be '''PHS-xxx''' ('''xxx''' being the last three hex digits of the device MAC w/ lower case letters).
